nodes.text: Kainnan was a city on Zerist, one of the moons of the gas giant Obri in the Tython system, mostly populated by the workers of Dessain Mining. It was located at the base of Sokar volcano to get heat and energy from it, though it meant a constant threat of occasional eruptions. The government of Zerist usually predicted the eruptions and evacuated the population for the periods of volcanic activity.
